item.title: Demystifying Continuous Integration, Delivery, and Deployment
item.description: This Calm.io blog recap was originally written and posted by me on December 28, 2015 at http://calm.io/2015/12/28/demystifying-continuous-integration-delivery-and-deployment/, and slightly enhanced on February 18, 2018, be sure to see the Postscript for more perspective!
